description: Must be a declared Finance major, must be enrolled full time, must provide statement of need, Preference given to a student with high GPA and achievement at UCO and must have a recommendation from the Finance Department chair. Eligibility Requirements Declared Finance major Enrolled full-time Provide a statement of need Recommendation from the Finance Department chair High GPA Selection Process Preference given to a student with high GPA and achievement at UCO
